name: Crescent Bay
summary: Crescent Bay is a short experimental detective thriller that was developed as part of Humble Bundle's Humble Original program.
storyline:
After visiting a friend’s home, you find that her house is now the scene of a mysterious and bloody crime. 
 
A bloody crime with no body or victim to be found. Playing as John Bishop, you possess an otherworldly gift. By channelling sequences of words, you can make ethereal connections with the ghosts of the past. 
 
It is up to you to learn of what happened to your dear friend Audrey. Find the memories, sequence the events, solve the crime.
